translation:
Friend and Sir Almeida. São Lourenço, May 29, 1843.

I have received your letters of the 14th and 29th of the past month, and in response I must tell you that, while not failing to recognize how much Your Grace Jaguarão Chico a batch of papers, for him to send them from there to Your Grace.

Your old and obliged friend Antônio Francisco dos Santos Abreu.

Answered on June 29, 1843. Handwriting of Domingos José de Almeida in

Answered on June 29, 1843.
